subject: ATTENTION IS NEEDED PLEASE!
body:
ATTENTION IS NEEDED PLEASE!
Greetings from the Wells Fargo Bank.
I have a vital information which needs to be attended immediately, Did
you authorized anyone to pick up your inheritance fund from our branch
in Cleveland Caldwell Idaho? A man called Mr Osondu Victor Igwilo came
to our office yesterday inrespect of your 20m which has been credited
with us for the past 2 months now by the Federal Government to be
transferred into your nominate bank account. He said that you
authorized him to pick up the fund.
This fund has been in our custody for the past two months now and we
have been waiting for you to contact us but we didn't know what is
hindering you from reaching us since. So we decided to write to you to
make sure that you are fine and aware of your inheritance funds of 20m
Million USD in our branch office in Caldwell Idaho.
We want you to get back to us with the following details:
Full Name:__________
Home address:_____
Age:________________
Occupation:_________
Phone number:______
Nearest airport:______
I await to hear from you ASAP.
get back to me as soon as possible
This above listed details are needed as fast as possible if you didn't
authorize anyone to pick up your fund from our branch in Idaho
best regards,
Mr. James C. Wilson.

subject: Re: ATTENTION IS NEEDED PLEASE!
body:
Hello Mr. James C. Wilson,

Thank you for reaching out to me from Wells Fargo Bank. I hope this message finds you well. I must admit, your email has caught my attention. However, I'm a bit confused about the situation you mentioned.

To clarify, I have not authorized anyone to pick up any funds from your branch in Cleveland Caldwell Idaho. In fact, I wasn't even aware that there were funds credited to me by the Federal Government. Could you please provide more details about this?

I want to make sure that everything is in order and that there hasn't been any misunderstanding or mistake. Can you explain why this man, Mr. Osondu Victor Igwilo, claims that I authorized him to collect the funds? It's quite puzzling to me as I have no knowledge of such an arrangement.

Additionally, could you please let me know what steps need to be taken on my part to ensure the safe transfer of these funds into my nominated bank account? I appreciate your assistance in clarifying this matter.

Best wishes,
Ethel

subject: Re: ATTENTION IS NEEDED PLEASE!
body:
Hello Ethel.
I got your message and it's well understood.
Mr igwailo is a fraudster and we have arrested him.
I'm sorry for my late response it's because we're verifying if he's really
telling the truth that you authorized him to claim your fund.
You have to provide your bank details for the transfer.
But you have to send $100 for changes.

subject: Re: ATTENTION IS NEEDED PLEASE!
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate you looking into the situation with Mr. Igwailo. Can you please provide more details on how I can proceed with providing my bank details for the transfer?

Best wishes,
Ethel

subject: Re: ATTENTION IS NEEDED PLEASE!
body:
Just send me your Bank account for the transfer then you have to send the
required fees of $100

subject: Re: ATTENTION IS NEEDED PLEASE!
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information. Can you please provide more details about the transfer and the fees required? I want to make sure I understand everything clearly before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Ethel

subject: Re: ATTENTION IS NEEDED PLEASE!
body: The fee is $100 and the transfer shall commence once you send the fee

subject: Re: ATTENTION IS NEEDED PLEASE!
body:
Oh, I see. Could you please provide more details about the fee and how the transfer process works?

Best wishes,
Ethel

subject: Re: ATTENTION IS NEEDED PLEASE!
body:
If you don't need your fund then go to hell,  how many times have I
provided more details to you

subject: Re: ATTENTION IS NEEDED PLEASE!
body:
Hello! I'm sorry to hear that you're feeling frustrated. Can you please provide me with more details about the fund you're referring to? I'd like to understand the situation better so I can try to help.

Best wishes,
Ethel

subject: Re: ATTENTION IS NEEDED PLEASE!
body:
I'm sorry to hear that you're feeling upset. Is there something specific that's bothering you? I'm here to listen if you'd like to share.

Best wishes,
Ethel
